<nowiki>[[File:lenny_hi.png]]</nowiki><<BR>><<BR>>
Hi there folks!<<BR>><<BR>>
I am the new mascot of '''Lubuntu''' and will be working under the supervision of the Marketing and Artwork teams. Any other use of me I will be considering a kind of slavery of my duties. So watch out for my lawyers. They will see to my payments ;) <<BR>>

Oh! Before I forget: If you're looking for the official '''Lubuntu''' artwork, it's <nowiki>[[Lubuntu-Artwork|here]]</nowiki>, or get back to <nowiki>[[Lubuntu-Marketing|Marketing]]</nowiki>.

<<BR>>

== Mascot use ==

Click on every image to make it bigger and download it for your neeeds, e.g. use the paper one on a drawing app like <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Edubuntu/AppGuides/inkscape|Inkscape]]</nowiki> or LibreOffice Draw and add your own text. Or use whatever you like as your avatar!
